members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
ImportModule implements the IPortable ImportModule Interface
The Id of the module to be imported The content to be imported The version of the module to be imported The Id of the user performing the import -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.name: T:Uberistic.Modules.UberSidePane.Data.DataSet
member.summary: Represents a strongly typed in-memory cache of data.

member.name: T:Uberistic.Modules.UberSidePane.Data.DataSet.UberBusinessProfileDataTable
member.summary: Represents the strongly named DataTable class.

member.name: T:Uberistic.Modules.UberSidePane.Data.DataSetTableAdapters.UberBusinessProfileTableAdapter
member.summary: Represents the connection and commands used to retrieve and save data.

member.name: T:Uberistic.Modules.UberSidePane.Data.DataSetTableAdapters.TableAdapterManager
member.summary: TableAdapterManager is used to coordinate TableAdapters in the dataset to enable Hierarchical Update scenarios

member.name: M:Uberistic.Modules.UberSidePane.Data.DataSetTableAdapters.TableAdapterManager.GetRealUpdatedRows(System.Data.DataRow[],System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Data.DataRow})
member.summary: Remove inserted rows that become updated rows after calling TableAdapter.Update(inserted rows) first

member.name: M:Uberistic.Modules.UberSidePane.Data.DataSetTableAdapters.TableAdapterManager.UpdateAll(Uberistic.Modules.UberSidePane.Data.DataSet)
member.summary: Update all changes to the dataset.

member.name: T:Uberistic.Modules.UberSidePane.Data.DataSetTableAdapters.TableAdapterManager.SelfReferenceComparer
member.summary: Used to sort self-referenced table's rows
